history.proof: intros d0 d1 H0 H1. unfold DTA_ref_ok, inter. hauto use: preDTA_produit_ref_ok unfold: DTA_ref_ok inv: DTA.

original: intros d0 d1 H0 H1. unfold DTA_ref_ok, inter. intros. apply (dta_ref_ok_check_correct (inter d0 d1)). apply dta_ref_ok_check_correct in H0. apply dta_ref_ok_check_correct in H1. unfold dta_ref_ok_check. reflexivity.
